content.en: Anti-jamming algorithms: Researchers have been exploring how algorithms can be used to combat jamming in wireless networks. They have developed various reinforcement learning approaches, such as modified Q-learning and deep reinforcement learning, to find effective strategies for channel hopping, idling patterns, and channel selection. These algorithms are designed to proactively avoid jammed channels and deceive reactive jammers, ultimately improving the reliability and security of wireless communication.
content.da: Anti-jamming algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan bruges til at bekæmpe jamming i trådløse netværk. De har udviklet forskellige forstærkende læringstilgange, såsom modificeret Q-learning og dyb forstærkende læring, for at finde effektive strategier for kanalhopping, idlingsmønstre og kanalselektion. Disse algoritmer er designet til proaktivt at undgå jammede kanaler og bedrage reaktive jammere, i sidste ende for at forbedre pålideligheden og sikkerheden af trådløs kommunikation.
